result.reason: EscapeSendKeys() in ConnectionContextMenu.cs omits '!' from its special-char list, causing SendKeys to interpret it as the Alt modifier instead of a literal character when sending passwords.
result.approach: Add '!' to the EscapeSendKeys() condition at line 1136 in ConnectionContextMenu.cs; also apply EscapeSendKeys (or equivalent) to finalCommand in PuttyBase.cs:247 before calling SendKeys.SendWait.
